analysis.description:
EthereumLottery.finalizeLottery (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#191-220) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Escrow(escrow).deposit.value(value)(winner) (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#216-217)
	- _ = admin.call.gas(GAS_LIMIT_DEPOSIT).value(this.balance)() (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#219-220)

Reentrancy in EthereumLottery.finalizeBlock (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#167-182):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(needsBlockFinalization()) (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#168-169)
	- blockHeight = BTCRelay(btcRelay).getLastBlockHeight() (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#180-181)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lotteries (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#181-182)

EthereumLottery.buyTickets (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#99-145) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-BTCRelay(btcRelay).storeBlockHeader(_extraData) (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#143-144)

EthereumLottery.needsBlockFinalization (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#145-167) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- btcTimestamp < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#159-160)
	- delta < 2 * 60 * 60 && lotteries[id].numTicketsSold == lotteries[id].numTickets && lotteries[id].decidingBlock == - 1 (/unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#161-167)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/12/0x608c460a08b10ca06b9b5fe45451cf2552fa2e4f.sol#101-106:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
